fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Compare your Attack Value with someone's else.
-Lower your Attack Value by one during the day. Attack Value resets back to Unstoppable the day after.
-Attack a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If the compared player's Attack Value is higher than yours, they will become a Target.
-If you attack someone who is not  a Target, you will suicide out of guilt.
-Every player that a Target visits also become a Target.
